org.plexian.grumy.entity

Class LivingEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.grumy.entity.Entity
      • org.plexian.grumy.entity.LivingEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Anti, Player

    public abstract class LivingEntity
extends Entity
    The class for a living entity, that is an entity with life.
    Author:
    walt

      • LivingEntity

        public LivingEntity(Inventory inventory,
                    Shader shader,
                    double life,
                    double maxLife,
                    Location location,
                    Vector2d size)
        Create a new instance of LivingEntity.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The entity's inventory.
        shader - The shader for the entity.
        life - The current life for the entity.
        maxLife - The max amount of life the entity can have.
        location - The location of the entity.
        size - The size of the entity's AABB as an ordered pair.

      • LivingEntity

        public LivingEntity(Shader shader,
                    double life,
                    double maxLife,
                    Location location,
                    Vector2d size)
        Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with size, maxLife, and life.
        Parameters:
        life - The current life of the entity.
        maxLife - The maximum life the entity can have.
        location - The location of the entity.
        size - The size of the entity as an ordered pair.

      • LivingEntity

        public LivingEntity(Inventory inventory,
                    Shader shader,
                    World w,
                    double x,
                    double y,
                    double sizeX,
                    double sizeY,
                    double life,
                    double maxLife)
        Create a new instance of LivingEntity at location with sizeX, sizeY, maxLife, and life.
        Parameters:
        w - The world the entity is at.
        x - The X-coordinate the entity is at.
        y - The Y-coordinate the entity is at.
        sizeX - The size of the entity X-axis respective.
        sizeY - The size of the entity Y-axis respective.
        life - The current life of the entity.
        maxLife - The maximum life the entity can have.
